 
{{Client function}}
This function is used to get the pan level of the specified [[/sound.md|sound]] element.

==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">float getSoundPan ( element theSound )</syntaxhighlight> 
{{OOP||[[/sound.md|sound]]:getPan|pan|setSoundPan}}
===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theSound:''' the [[/sound.md|sound]] element which pan you want to get.

===Returns===
Returns ''float'' value with range from ''-1.0 (left)'' to ''1.0 (right)'', ''false'' otherwise.

==Example== 
<section name="Client" class="client" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function playMusic ()
        local song = playSound('song.mp3')
        setSoundPan(song, 0.3)
        outputChatBox("Current pan is "..tostring(getSoundPan(song)))
end

addCommandHandler("music", playMusic)
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
